show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 122 Wayne Gibbins on the role of tech in regenerative agriculture from gene editing to nanotech soil sensors
subtitle: 122 Wayne Gibbins on the role of tech in regenerative agriculture from gene editing to nanotech soil sensors
summary:
With Waybe Gibbins of New Foundation Farms we discussed how to invest in technology to regenerate soil at scale.

Key Points:

  •  the appropriate role of tech in building soils 

  • working with nature,tech and farmers 

  • difference between gene editing and market assistant technology
